overview: Behold! A new block is born. At its edge, on top, sits a youth - not to jump off but to experience the relentless, temporary bombardment of beauty from all directions. (Pronounced 'Nirvitz')  Music used:  Pepsipurgatory (ME) - 'Rymkom'  The Gerogerigegege – 'ゲロゲリゲゲゲ (The Gerogerigegege)'
title: Nyrwyc(.Revivemywish)
